summary: SummaryJuvia's Place I AM MAGIC Liquid Concealer: Weightless full coverage concealer formulated to be the best full coverage concealer, great for all skin types and skin tones.
details: DetailsFeaturesSweat-proofWaterproofFormulated WithoutParabensSulfatesItem 2551099How To UseApply I Am Magic Concealer directly onto imperfections using doe-foot and blend softly using a sponge.Tip: To brighten under eye use a lighter shade of concealer and to contour and define specific areas of the face use two shades darker.IngredientsHydrogenated Polyisobutene, Water, Cetearyl Ethylhexanoate, Silica, Polyglyceryl-4 Diisostearate/Polyhydroxystearate/Sebacate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Butylene Glycol, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Isododecane, Silica Silylate, Disodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Sodium Chloride, Quaternium-90 Bentonite, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Aluminum Hydroxide, Potassium Sorbate, Propylene Carbonate, Hexylene Glycol, Disodium EDTA, Tocopheryl Acetate, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer. May Contain: Iron Oxides (CI 77492, 77491, 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891).
how_to_use: Apply I Am Magic Concealer directly onto imperfections using doe-foot and blend softly using a sponge.Tip: To brighten under eye use a lighter shade of concealer and to contour and define specific areas of the face use two shades darker.
ingredients: Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer. May Contain: Iron Oxides (

reviews.headline: Juvia's is the Truth!
reviews.comments: Love the coverage, the lightweight feel, and the long wear of this product. I can wear it by itself on my dark spots when I don't want to do a full look, or as a base on my dark spots before applying foundation. It's a great product!

reviews.headline: nice product especially for the price
reviews.comments: very nice product but its hard to blend

reviews.headline: Full coverage
reviews.comments: I mostly use this as a foundation. This provides full natural coverage. This is my go to when I'm going to parties or professional head shorts. It's not heavy at all.. Please do not stop making it.

reviews.headline: My go to concealer
reviews.comments: Well I'm not a makeup savvy but this concealer works great for me. I like its medium/full coverage that also helps me to cover some dark spots due to sun exposure, pregnancy and age. It feels light and has a variety of shades.

reviews.headline: Sad
reviews.comments: I was so excited to use this and then it just sucks. When you apply it, theres coverage and it looks like its gonna be good but then you blend it and it just thins out completely. It does not cover my dark spots. You have apply at least two layers to cover anything dark. I prefer a full coverage concealer with a medium coverage foundation.

reviews.headline: Too oily for me
reviews.comments: The shade was perfect but it became oily. My face is on the dry side but this was too oily. Returned it.

reviews.headline: best concealer ever
reviews.comments: the best concealer ever! my makeup always looks flawless when I use this! it's my everyday base.

reviews.headline: I will definitely buy this product again.
reviews.comments: I will definitely buy this concealer again.  I have tried several products and they leave a yellow or uneven look but this product blends well.

reviews.headline: Great coverage
reviews.comments: Provides long lasting, buildable, natural looking coverage. Feels weightless on the skin. Doesn't oxidize or go on oily. Beautiful pigmentation. Very happy with this concealer.

reviews.headline: Perfect cover
reviews.comments: This concealer last all day and covers easily.

reviews.headline: AMAZING FOR ITS PRICE !!
reviews.comments: The concealer was very creamy for my undereye which was good, the applicator was very soft!! Its coverage is pretty good for its price its more medium coverage than full but itll do. The filter to match your skin was honestly very persise i found my shade although i should definetly have gotten a shade lighter or two for the bright under eye!!! My only con was that its not full coverage.

reviews.headline: Amazing for oily skin
reviews.comments: I usually don't leave reviews but this product has become my holy grail. I have very oily skin and have tried multiple concealer & foundations that would just separate by the end of the day. This concealer never separates on me and even works as foundation! Amazing product

reviews.headline: AMAZING for dry under eyes with fine lines!!
reviews.comments: I have always struggled with dry fine lines under my eyes and im very picky with my concelears! Ive tried the tower 28, nars, maybeline etc .. and i stick with my elf hydrating concelear even tho it seperates after some time. This juvias concelear is the most hydrating full coverage concelear ive tried so far and wow!! Im in love. It didnt start to crack or seperate my undereyes looked and felt super hydrated! It melts like butter. Love this concealer I feel like its so underrated!

reviews.headline: 10/10 concealer
reviews.comments:
I never write reviews unless the product really WOWS me, and this product did just that !

I stopped into Ulta yesterday and purchased this on whim, and thank god I did. This is my new favorite concealer and i will definitely be purchasing again and again. 

I am very pale and loved that this brand had a shade for me as most brands don't! This concealer applies evenly, looks very natural while still offering good coverage, is very brightening, doesn't crease, and lasts all day. It genuinely boosts my confidence when I wear it. 

I love this product and would HIGHLY recommend.

reviews.headline: Pretty good
reviews.comments: I tried this concealer out and I tend to use concealer as foundation as it feels less cakey on my face and it worked great. A little but blended with a brush goes a long way you dont even need much of it. Love how inclusive Juvias Place is considering a lot of brands still lack that even in 2025… but anyways the ONLY con i will say is that if you have a lot of natural creasing in your undereye, just be cautious. Applying a little is best as the first time i used it i put a lot to get a full coverage look but it creased pretty bad. I since then apply a light amount and it works great. Would recommend!

reviews.headline: great for medium to full coverage
reviews.comments: I've had the same concealer bottle for 4 years now because a little really does go a long way. it's buildable but for my skin tone it doesn't completely cover under eye darkness like the tarte shape tape does.

reviews.headline: JUVIA!! I'm gagged
reviews.comments: Black girls get this. The shade range and finish is perfection.I use this as my high lighting concealer and my regular schemgular spot concealer. She has never let me down and she is AFFORABLE. I love me some high end foundations, but the concealers have never topped this.

reviews.headline: LOVE SO MUCHH
reviews.comments: I love this concealer a lot and it's my go to.  it does get a bit leaky but the product itself is amazing

reviews.headline: I love this
reviews.comments: I actually love this, It's not too cakey and it does not break me out

reviews.headline: It is awesone
reviews.comments: Love this!

media.caption: Concealer covers up every unwanted spot.

I would so buy this over and over

faceoff_positive.comments: Love the product but 4 stars due to the packaging. Can become very sloppy.
faceoff_positive.headline: Great product … new packaging needed.

faceoff_negative.comments:
I unfortunately had severe reactions to these concealers and the matching foundations I got from this range.
I made sure to check how my skin reacted to just concealer alone, foundation alone, and both on my skin together.
I wanted to love this, I swear by this brand's lip products. But I have been suffering with burning pimply allergic reactions to this product that sensitized me to other skincare products that suited my skin just fine before I tried out the foundation and the concealers in this range. 
I have to throw this and the foundation out. I don't even want to know what would happen if I return to ever using it again because it caused my eyelids and the surrounding skin to burn and swell up, all over my face I went red and every inch was inflamed, even skin flaking and peeling. I haven't had this happen in YEARS since I've been meticulous about my skincare and sunscreen. So unfortunately I won't be touching anything but the lip products I already have by this brand again. absolutely disappointing, and I'm pretty lucky I am seeing gradual improvement in my skin, but I'm still seeing a doctor to verify my skin is healing properly after weeks of not using the foundation and concealer has still left my skin so delicate and stings a bit when I put on my most soothing products like snail mucin essence, cicaplast baume and rosewater.
As a separate note excluding the reactions, the concealer texture is decent, a bit on the less coverage side in my opinion especially when the foundation for this range  is so thick and full coverage. Shade range of the concealers cater to neutral olive tone skin much better than the foundation. 
But I can't even use these despite the shade match because something very bad is in these products I got from the Juvia's Place website directly.
faceoff_negative.headline: Wanted to like it - caused severe allergic reactions
